name: Life Cycle
description:
The game is made for "BingyanTestJam" .The theme of this jam is: loop. From the time we were born to the time we grew up, and then to the old, from the bear doll we longed for as a child to fame and fortune, we have been recycling our life from generation to generation.

From the time we were born to the time we grew up, and then to the old, from the bear doll we longed for as a child to fame and fortune, we have been recycling our life from generation to generation.

Operation mode:

  • Click the icon next to it to select the moving mode;
  • Click the selected icon to cancel;
  • Click to start playing level;
  • After entering the level, press the space to switch the icon.

We have designed five levels in 48 hours. We have no time to show more. We hope to improve the game in the future. It is the first time for all members of our team to participate in gamejam. Thanks for your playing.

本游戏是“BingyanTestJam”的参赛作品，本次gamejam的主题为：循环。

从我们出生到我们长大，再到老去，从儿时渴望的熊娃娃到成年人追逐的名利，我们就此一代又一代循环着我们的人生。

操作方式：

  • 点击旁边的图标选择移动方式；
  • 点击已选的图标可取消；
  • 点击开始游玩关卡；
  • 进入关卡后按空格切换图标。

我们在48h内设计了五个关卡，更多的关卡想法没有时间展示了，希望在未来有机会更加完善这个游戏。我们队的所有成员都是第一次参加gamejam，感谢您的游玩。

最后，我要感谢我们组的所有成员协力完成了这个还仍待打磨的作品：

程序：JAYA ，  RAY

美术：JUMPINGMOUSE

策划：TOUKO
